com.oosegroup19.memoize.scheduler

Class SampleAlarmReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oosegroup19.memoize.scheduler.SampleAlarmReceiver

  • public class SampleAlarmReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    The SampleAlarmReceiver class that sets the alarm. When the alarm fires, this WakefulBroadcastReceiver receives the broadcast Intent and then starts the IntentService SampleSchedulingService to do some work.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Cancels the alarm.

      Retrieves the AlarmManager.

      void setAlarm(Context context)
      Sets a repeating alarm that runs once a day at approximately 8:30 a.m.

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
                      Intent intent)

      • setAlarm

        public void setAlarm(Context context)
        Sets a repeating alarm that runs once a day at approximately 8:30 a.m. When the alarm fires, the app broadcasts an Intent to this WakefulBroadcastReceiver.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the alarm
